item.description:
I am looking forward to Democratic victory down the
line at the polls next tuesday and want to celebrate
with DFA:Amherst next Wednesday 7:00 at Rao's
coffeeshop in Amherst! Stop by for a casual gathering
with fellow DFA members and come with your own

The Amherst Chapter of DFA is looking for a new organizer. It is important to maintain this organization particularly after successfully helping to elect progressive candidate Peter Vickery to the Governors Council. We all know we have hard work to do to elect democrats at the state and national level.
item.name: Democracy for America Meetup - Amherst Chapter December Meetup
